strings.description: A group of metal minituars that shine elegantly in sparkling silver. Always traveling in groups of three, the amount of experience this cluster provides exceeds that of even the metal gigantuar. Although the amount of experience each species of cactuar holds was initially attributed to their size, the existence of the king metal minituar altered that perspective. Scholars are currently struggling with the invalidation of their original theory.
strings.summon:
Do you want our power?
Well? Weeeeell?
